# [[this]]; this one

====Usage notes====
* Unlike English {{m|en|this}}, {{lang|zh|這個}}／{{lang|zh|这个}} is not used for units of time such as {{zh-l|年}}, {{zh-l|月}}, and {{zh-l|日}}. Rather, {{zh-l|今}} is used. For example, {{zh-l|今晚|tonight}}, {{zh-l|今天|today}}, and {{zh-l|今年|this year}}.
